trans-unit.source: Contains properties for a script block being parsed.
trans-unit.target: 包含正在剖析的指令碼區塊之屬性。

trans-unit.source: During page parsing, information about a script block is stored in the <xref:System.Web.Compilation.LinePragmaCodeInfo> class.
trans-unit.target: 頁面在剖析期間，指令碼區塊的相關資訊會儲存在<xref:System.Web.Compilation.LinePragmaCodeInfo>類別。

trans-unit.source: This class is used in the <xref:System.Web.UI.SimpleWebHandlerParser> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別用於<xref:System.Web.UI.SimpleWebHandlerParser>類別。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.Compilation.LinePragmaCodeInfo> is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Compilation.LinePragmaCodeInfo> .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Compilation.LinePragmaCodeInfo" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.Compilation.LinePragmaCodeInfo" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Compilation.LinePragmaCodeInfo" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.Compilation.LinePragmaCodeInfo" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: To use the properties of a <xref:System.Web.Compilation.LinePragmaCodeInfo> instance, use the constructor overload that takes parameters.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用的屬性<xref:System.Web.Compilation.LinePragmaCodeInfo>執行個體，請使用採用參數的建構函式多載。

trans-unit.source: The starting line of a script block in an .aspx file.
trans-unit.target: .aspx 檔案中指令碼區塊的開始行。

trans-unit.source: The starting column of a script block in an .aspx file.
trans-unit.target: .aspx 檔案中指令碼區塊的開始欄。

trans-unit.source: The starting column of a script block in the generated source file.
trans-unit.target: 產生的原始程式檔中指令碼區塊的開始欄。

trans-unit.source: The length of the script block.
trans-unit.target: 指令碼區塊的長度。

trans-unit.source: A value indicating whether the script block is located inside <% %> tags.
trans-unit.target: 值，指出指令碼區塊是否位於 <% %> 標記內。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Compilation.LinePragmaCodeInfo" /> class with parameters for initializing the <see cref="P:System.Web.Compilation.LinePragmaCodeInfo.StartLine" />, <see cref="P:System.Web.Compilation.LinePragmaCodeInfo.StartColumn" />, <see cref="P:System.Web.Compilation.LinePragmaCodeInfo.StartGeneratedColumn" />, <see cref="P:System.Web.Compilation.LinePragmaCodeInfo.CodeLength" />, and <see cref="P:System.Web.Compilation.LinePragmaCodeInfo.IsCodeNugget" /> properties.
trans-unit.target: 搭配參數初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.Compilation.LinePragmaCodeInfo" /> 類別的新執行個體，以初始化 <see cref="P:System.Web.Compilation.LinePragmaCodeInfo.StartLine" />、<see cref="P:System.Web.Compilation.LinePragmaCodeInfo.StartColumn" />、<see cref="P:System.Web.Compilation.LinePragmaCodeInfo.StartGeneratedColumn" />、<see cref="P:System.Web.Compilation.LinePragmaCodeInfo.CodeLength" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Web.Compilation.LinePragmaCodeInfo.IsCodeNugget" /> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets the length of the script block.
trans-unit.target: 取得指令碼區塊的長度。

trans-unit.source: The length of the script block.
trans-unit.target: 指令碼區塊的長度。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the script block is located inside <% %> tags.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出指令碼區塊是否位於 <% %> 標記內。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the script block is contained inside <% %> tags; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 如果指令碼區塊包含在<%%>標記; 否則<see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Code located within the \<% %> tags is referred to as a "nugget".
trans-unit.target: 程式碼位於\<%%> 標記會稱為 「 nugget"。

trans-unit.source: Gets the starting column of a script block in an .aspx file.
trans-unit.target: 取得 .aspx 檔案中指令碼區塊的開始欄。

trans-unit.source: The starting column of a script block in an .aspx file.
trans-unit.target: .aspx 檔案中指令碼區塊的開始欄。

trans-unit.source: Gets the starting column of a script block in the generated source file.
trans-unit.target: 取得產生的原始程式檔中指令碼區塊的開始欄。

trans-unit.source: The starting column of a script block in the generated source file.
trans-unit.target: 產生的原始程式檔中指令碼區塊的開始欄。

trans-unit.source: Gets the starting line of a script block in an .aspx file.
trans-unit.target: 取得 .aspx 檔案中指令碼區塊的開始行。

trans-unit.source: The starting line of a script block in an .aspx file.
trans-unit.target: .aspx 檔案中指令碼區塊的開始行。
